verbose_text: Collectively, these findings clearly indicate that MFG-E8 inhibits neutrophil migration by downregulating surface CXCR2 expression through the upregulation of the expression of the intracellular negative regulator, GRK2, and this event is mediated by alpha v beta 3 -integrin mediated MAP kinase activation (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of the intracellular negative regulator, GRK2
